channel.title: Posts on Chris Turner

item.title: My First Blog!
item.description: Hello world! Here’s my first blog. I am typing this while I’m on the road to the Rio Grande Valley. I have been working on project 2 while I was packing and getting ready to move out of my apartment. Now, I am working on this Project 3 while I take advantage on this 7 hour road trip.
